channel.title: Training on objects?
channel.description: Allright,i'm using Godz Of chaoz v2 and it's wildly altar based. it's like in 13 wild in real rs. To train you use pots-att/str/def and it levels you. I want to add a dummy that you can train attack on. Maybe a haystack for defence and idk what object for str. how would I do this?

item.title: Training on objects?
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

addglobalobject

then make a case for the object under object click 1

Read full topic
